name: Chicken! (Wambob)
description:
Don't be a chicken - be a chicken who picks up a sword and charges head first into a dungeon!

Extremely rudimentary roguelike featuring tons of loot, enemies and a chicken (just one). If this piques your interest, give it a try! (sorry in advance).

Controls:

WASD - bake a pie

Q - see what's in your backpack

Mouse - didn't really test what this does, see for yourself o_0

Esc - there is no escape...
